long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Anonymous Notes Chrome Extension enables users to effortlessly create and manage notes with complete privacy. Simply provide a UUID to access the extension—no registration required. Save and query/summarize your notes anonymously. Enjoy the convenience of seamless note-taking with anonymity.

Your local key is always stored on your local machine, ensuring that all encryption and decryption processes happen locally. This means that without your local key, nobody—including us—can read your notes.

Don't forget your ID and local key!
